definition: adoption (e.g. of a nephew as a son)/to inherit
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards

sentences.english: Why does one lead to or entail the other?
sentences.chinese: 它们如何彼此导引与承继？

sentences.english: What merits I inherit from my parents?
sentences.chinese: 我可从父母承继哪些优点？

sentences.english: This contradiction reflects the inherent tension and difficult choices between revolutionary policies and tradition.
sentences.chinese: 这体现了革命策略与承继传统的内在矛盾和困难选择。

sentences.english: The Manchu narration-chant story-telling has been basically handed down generation after generation by mouth and ear.
sentences.chinese: 满族讲唱说部主要在氏族内以口耳相传，代代承继。

sentences.english: He inherited a big fortune from a remote relative.
sentences.chinese: 他承继了远房亲戚的一大笔财富。

sentences.english: Family residence is the cultural inheritance of ancestral ranges today, the best one of the sites.
sentences.chinese: 家庭住宅是今天承继这一文化祖产的最理想场所之一。

sentences.english: So it must be with this generation of Americans.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这一代美国人也必须承继下去。

sentences.english: It points out that there is a historical relationship between Zhenjiang Huoxing Temple and Runzhou Huoxian Temple of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 镇江火星庙与唐代润州火祆庙之间具有历史承继关系。

sentences.english: His arrogant temperament is a kind of inheritance of the chivalrous Mohist spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他捐狂桀骜的个性则承继了墨家侠义精神的气息。

sentences.english: On the orbit, the rabbits habitually inherited the merits of the inhabitants. ?
sentences.chinese: 在轨道上，兔子风俗性地承继了居平易近们的长处。

definition: to adopt/to give for adoption (usually to a childless relative)
to continue/to continue a family line/posterity/heir
the cassock and alms bowl of a Buddhist master passed on to the favorite disciple (Buddhism)/legacy/mantle
the mission in life of a deceased person, left to others to carry on
Zhangzi county in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1]
